item.title: THM_SimpleCTF_Walkthrough
item.description: SimpleCTF TryHackMe performed by: jb-williams Simple CTF Deploy the machine and attempt the questions! Initial Scan First we run nmap on the target IP. The first scan didn’t give me any info and even suggested adding -Pn to the command: nmap -v -T4 -sV -sC -Pn -oA nmap/initial 10.10.237.242 This output will provide the answers for the first two questions. In the nmap output I noticed that the ftp service on port 21 allowed anonymous login.
